content: sometimes simple is best and that s what i love about this easy mesh market bag pattern it only uses treble_crochet stitches for the body and single_crochet for the straps you can whip it up in no time and get to shopping please note that an ad-free pdf version of this pattern is available for purchase in my ravelry store to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/easy-mesh-market-bag-free-crochet-pattern/ materials 244 yards size 3 yarn i used kc essential cotton in beach us i/ 5 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors final size 16 tall not including straps straps are about 8 tall 14 wide at widest part of bag when laid flat without stretching stitches used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet
